config.site_desc: A demo project to show how to generate living documentation with Behave.

tags.name: setup
tags.title: Setup
tags.desc: Creating a task helps to get work done and makes it easier to see what people are doing.
tags.long_desc:
Task creation in Odoo is super easy. Here's some advantages:

  • Track time spent on project
  • Set deadlines
  • Assign a reviewer
